ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Update a repository
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Update a repository
ActivityMetadata.Description: **Note**: To edit a repository's topics, use the [Replace all repository topics](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#replace-all-repository-topics) endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Update a repository

**Note**: To edit a repository's topics, use the [Replace all repository topics](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#replace-all-repository-topics) endpoint.

Method: Patch

OperationID: repos/update

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}

ActivitySourceMetadata.SourceCode:

</Assemblies> <SourceCode></SourceCode> </Activity>
